bug.author: sandeep-krishnamurthy
bug.summary: Latest pip build do not install deep-model-export as CLI utility
bug.description: With latest pip build of deep-model-server, I am unable to use deep-model-export CLI utility. Something in setup.py is broken? I need to use full path - /usr/bin/.....

comments.comment: It works fine for me. pip uninstall first and then install?
uninstall and re-install works. pip upgrade did not since we had moved modules around a bit. Closing.
